name: Anil Krishna Yadav
about: Anil Krishna Yadav did his Btech. in the department of Chemistry at IIT Kanpur from 2018-22. After graduation he is working as a Machine Learning Engineer at Finarb Consulting Pvt. Ltd. in kolkata.

name: Prakash Kumar Singh
about: Prakash Kr Singh did his B-Tech in department of Mechanical Engineering at NIT Silchar from 2013-17. He then came to IIT Kanpur for masters in Manufacturing Science.

name: Dr. Jayant Mohanta
about: Dr. Jayant Kumar Mohanta did his B-Tech in department of Mechanical Engineering at IIT Indore from 2010-14.
